text: The German Doctor () is a 2013 Argentine French Spanish Norwegian drama thriller movie directed and written by Lucía Puenzo who based on her novel Wakolda (2011). The movie stars Àlex Brendemühl as Nazi SS officer Josef Mengele, Florencia Bado, Natalia Oreiro, Diego Peretti, Alan Daicz and Elena Roger. == Other websites == * * Category:2013 drama thriller movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:Argentine thriller movies Category:French drama movies Category:French thriller movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:Spanish thriller movies Category:Norwegian drama movies Category:Norwegian thriller movies
title: The German Doctor
